ClearUserPersonalization

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 22.0. This procedure cleared old "User Metadata" as well. Use ClearPersonalizedPagesForUser instead.

[Obsolete(This procedure cleared old "User Metadata" as well. Use ClearPersonalizedPagesForUser instead.,22.0)]
